Package org.erlide.tracing.core

Interface Summary
ITraceNodeObserver Interface which should be implemented by every class which wants to be notified about tracing or loading.
 

Class Summary
Activator The activator class controls the plug-in life cycle
Constants Abstract class containing constants.
TraceBackend Singleton class used for communication with trace node.
 

Enum Summary
Images Enum describing images used by plugin.
ProcessFlag Enum containing flags which may be set on process under tracing.
ProcessMode Enum describing ways in which processes can be traced.
TraceType Enum representing trace types (e.g.
TracingStatus Elements of this enum describe possible results of starting/stopping tracing and loading traces from disk.
